name: "Armored" Scrats
description: These Scrats are surprisingly hardy. Maybe they're not just regular Scrats wearing a barrel.

name: A.I.M Bot
description: This [[Drone Walker]] has the Automated Intelligent Murder system pre-loaded to gain '''Marksmanship''' and '''Shield'''. Now a solid ranged attacker with no fear and no mercy.

name: Annihilator
description: This is as big as guns get.. Yes, it does area damage!

name: Arcane Bolt
description: '''Destroy''' the highest health Ground Minion in the area if it has 500 or less health. Else '''Stun''' it and gain 1 mana instead.

name: Arcane Golem
description: Mystical ranged unit fueled by magic. When its Master casts a spell, it gains +40 Health and +6 Damage.

name: Arcane Missiles
description: Fires 5 arcane missiles in the selected direction. Each missile hits the first enemy in its way and deals 30 damage.

name: Armored Escort
description: Summons 2 [[Crystal Sentry|Crystal Sentries]] with '''Mana Surge''' to escort the next Ranged Minion you play. No, not that kind of escort!

name: Assassin
description: The Assassin stays invisible while not attacking or taking damage. Deals triple damage when he attacks from invisibility.

name: AtG Drone x8
description: A though but slow flier with only Air-to-Ground weaponry. Shoots at all nearby targets.

name: Bahra the Witchwolf
description: '''Spectral Essence'''

name: Banner Man
description: When played, he gives a '''shield''' to the 5 closest minions within 8 range.

name: Bats Bats Bats!
description: For the next 5 seconds summon 1 [[Nether Bat]] for each mana you spend. Playing it again prolongs duration, not effect.

name: Battle Shi-Hou
description: A fierce fighter who attacks faster when surrounded by enemies(Max 450% bonus). Also a big fan of monkey business

name: Bazooka Scrat
description: Light ranged Minion that deals heavy damage to buildings only.

name: Beam of DOOM!
description: A popular UFO weapon, deals massive damage in a small area over a few seconds.

name: Black Hole
description: Suck up ALL minions in an area, removing them from the board for the rest of the spell's duration.

name: Blast Entry
description: [[Settsu (Minion)|Settsu]] enters the battlefield dealing 50 damage on impact and gaining a 300 health shield.

name: Blastmancer
description: '''Spectral Essence'''

name: Blind Date
description: Summons a random 5-mana minion card.

name: Blood Imps
description: Small ritualistic imps. Their master loses health equal to the damage they take - even overkill damage!

name: Blue Golem
description: Solid as a Rock, hard to destroy and it hurts when it hits you.

name: Book of the Dead
description: Replace your hand with pages from Book of the Dead.

name: Boom Buggy
description: Rains a barrage of 6 missiles at random targets within range.

name: Boomer
description: Hatches from an egg after a short delay. The boomer explodes on contact or death and deals a lot of area damage!

name: Border Patrol
description: Summon 1 [[Crystal Sentry]] and 1 [[Crystal Arcanist]].

name: Bounty Sniper
description: Gives its Master extra XP for each of its kills and attacks on the enemy tower.

name: Bridge Buddies
description: Summon an [["Armored" Scrats|Armored Scrat]] on both bridges.

name: Bridge Shrine
description: Generates 15 XP over 60 sec - regards, XP INC.

name: Brothers of Light
description: From the Chapter of Light, the very elite of the Empyrean army, these two soldiers come equipped with slow but heavy hitting maces and their imbued '''Armor of Light'''

name: Brutish Betrayer
description: '''Turncoat''', '''Rage'''

name: Burn The Bridges
description: Both bridges get covered in flames, dealing 40 damage per sec to unfortunate ground enemies.  Lasts 5 sec.

name: Caeleth Dawnhammer
description: The fabled commander of the elite VI regiment. His '''Armor of Light''' also creates a '''Divine Shield'''.

name: Caged Prowler
description: After 20 seconds the cage releases the [[Prowler]] and falls apart.

name: Call To Arms
description: Replace each of your non-master Buildings with a [[Warrior]].

name: Cannon Roller
description: Powerful single target shooter that rolls backwards when shooting.

name: Chain Lightning
description: A roaring streak of lightning that deals damage and '''stuns'''. It jumps to the nearest enemy until there are none left within range.

name: Cheese Date
description: Summons a random 3-mana Scrat Minion card and gives it '''Rage'''.

name: Clear Skies
description: A soothing wind clears the arena healing all Minions and Masters 250 health and removes '''Shield''' and '''Rage'''

name: Cleaver
description: Very high damage but very slow attack speed.

name: Colossus
description: It swipes enemies in a huge arc in front of it. It's probably the best at what it does.

name: Combustion
description: '''Stun''' affected friendly Minions. After a delay they explode, dealing damage to themselves and enarby Enemies.

name: Commander Azali
description: Big and strong, the Commander will show the way!

name: Crakgul Doomcleaver
description: Crakgul inspires his demon brethren with a celebration of killing. Whenever killing a Minion or hitting the enemy tower, he reduces the mana cost of a random voidborne card in hand by 1 until it is played.

name: Crossbow Dudes
description: Cheap ranged unit group, low health and damage, but good friends.

name: Crossbow Guild
description: Place a guild of jolly [[Crossbow Dudes]] that will summon jolly dudes over time.

name: Crossbow Trap
description: Stealth. Fires bolts at nearby minions.

name: Crystal Arcanist
description: '''Mana Surge'''

name: Crystal Archers
description: These Crystal Elves are deadly at long range, but fragile up close. Their '''Mana Surge''' enables them to shoot faster when you have enough mana.

name: Crystal Construct
description: The Crystal Constructs act as both shield and stockpile for the magically dependent elven army. On summon it grants you 1 Mana

name: Crystal Sentry
description: '''Mana Surge'''

name: Cursebearer
description: '''Spectral Essence'''

name: Cursed Fireball
description: All enemy Minions in the impact area are '''Cursed'''.

name: Daggerfall
description: Great against hordes of low health enemies, such as Scrats!

name: Decoy Trap
description: Taunts nearby enemy minions.

name: Defenso Chopper
description: When hit by melee attackers, it deals 75 counter damage and '''stuns''' them for 3 seconds.

name: Demon Warrior
description: From the 5th time this card is played and beyond, Demon Warrior has triple health and damage.

name: Disruptor Puff
description: When reaching a bridge and every 6 seconds thereafter, teleport to the other bridge.

name: Divine Warrior
description: Though this [[Warrior]] failed her trials with the Chapel of Light, she still picked up a few tricks, like a handy '''Divine Shield'''.

name: Dragon Ball
description: It's a [[Fireball]], but if the last card you played was a Minion of cost 6 or more, it also summons a [[Dragon Whelp]] where it lands!

name: Dragon Nest
description: Summons a [[Flightless Dragons|Flightless Dragon Whelp]] whenever its Master plays a Spell. Summons a [[Dragon Whelp]] instead if the spell costs 5+ mana.

name: Dragon Pack
description: A devastating pack of flying evil. And cuteness

name: Dragon Whelp
description: Has wings, which is good against melee ground minions.

name: Drain Life
description: Drain 100 health from the closest enemy Minion, transferring it to Morellia.

name: Drone Buzzers
description: Known as Buzzers because they're small and irritating, and a good sway takes care of them.

name: Drone Force One
description: Powerful, but the firing crew left to become fishermen, so the pilot is busy.

name: Drone Walker
description: Solid ranged attacker with no fear.

name: Elite Swarmer
description: A fast and somewhat durable monster. The armor plating does it.

name: Empowered Soul Stealer
description: The Empowered [[Soul Stealer]] starts with 2 souls. Starts with 4 souls instead if a friendly minions has '''Rage'''

name: Fire Imp
description: A pyromaniac whose magic leaves fire on the ground to incinerate groups of enemies.

name: Fireball
description: Great against groups of low to medium health enemies.

name: Flightless Dragons
description: In baby dragon world you play rough.  Unfortunately, pissing off your big sister could make her take a bite out of your wing.

name: Forbidden Knowledge
description: 2 of Morellia's 4+ mana spells cost 1 less until played. Does not Stack.

name: Future Past
description: When used, it permanently replaces itself with another random 1-cost or higher card and reduces that card's mana cost by 1.

name: Future Present
description: When used, it permanently replaces itself with another random 2-cost or higher card and reduces that card's mana cost by 2.

name: Gambler's Ball
description: Casts either a [[Healing Fireball]], [[Fireball]] or in rare cases, both!

name: Gax the World Bomb
description: Hatches from an egg after a short delay. On contact or death, he blows up to deal damage to EVERYTHING.

name: Ghost
description: Possesses an enemy, turning it to your side. The enemy becomes '''Cursed''' and gains '''Spectral Essence'''

name: Ghost Turret
description: '''Spectral Essence'''

name: Gor'Rakk Brutes
description: Summons a [[Cleaver]], but if the last card you played was a 3-mana spell, also summons a [[Rammer]]

name: Gor'Rakk Gate
description: Open a portal to the void and Summon either of the following with '''Turncout''':

name: Gor'Rakk Sacrifice
description: Disables a random friendly Minion for 5 seconds, then kills it to summon a [[Cleaver]]

name: Grasping Thorns
description: '''Untargetable'''.

name: Grenadier
description: Throws explosives, good at dealing with groups of enemies.

name: Guardian
description: This hunk of health guards nearby friendly Crystal Elf minions, absorbing any damage they take from outside sources.

name: Harbinger
description: Wields the most powerful magic of the Slither Lords, but his slavedriving days have taught him to let others do the rushing.

name: Haunting Hugger
description: All it wants in the afterlife is to give everyone a good haunting hug!

name: Heal Puff
description: When on a bridge it heals its Master by 25 health per sec.

name: Healing Fireball
description: Heals all friendly minions by 400. Yes, it is a HEALING fireball...

name: Healing Shrine
description: Heals all nearby friendly minions over time.

name: Herald Ah'Mun
description: Holding the Eye of Xipetl allows Ah'Mun to cheat death once by performing '''Sacrifice''': Heal 75 health for each Slitherbound sacrificed. Brutally lashes groups of enemies and can '''Call Slitherbound (2)'''.

name: Howling Moon
description: Reduce all Minions to 50% health, and summon 2 [[Werewolf|Werewolfs]]

name: Hypnotize
description: After a short delay, enemy minions caught in the area are hypnotized and join your side for 5 seconds.

name: Illusory Cleaver
description: Summons an illusion of a [[Cleaver]] with little health and no damage - but it explodes when killed for 20 damage!

name: Incubus
description: This fearless demon teleports at any ranged attacker using his area attack to create destruction.

name: Infiltration
description: Summon 4 [[Plasma Marines]] wherever you want!

name: Jolo the Hero Scrat
description: 50% chance to avoid any damage.

name: Jungle Jumble
description: Remove this card and shuffle 3 Zen-Chi cards into your deck.

name: Laser Turret
description: When staying on the same target, it fires faster and faster.

name: Last Stand
description: Summons 5 [[Legionnaires]], but 7 if your opponent controls both bridges!

name: Legionnaires
description: A tough group of melee fighters.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: '''Destroy''' a random enemy Minion or Building.

name: Living Statue
description: '''Call Slitherbound'''

name: Lone Scout
description: '''Mana Surge'''

name: Lone Wolf
description: '''Rage'''

name: Lord-Sentinel Thelec
description: '''Mana Surge.'''

name: Lost Legionnaires
description: '''Empyrean Army:''' Gain '''Rage'''

name: Magma Cannon
description: This cannon fires flaming balls of magma at any enemies in range. For when you need more firepower.

name: Magma Storm
description: Call down 10 magma rocks in a large area. Magma rocks deal damage to ANYTHING.

name: Mana Puff
description: When on a bridge it generates 1 mana every 10 sec.

name: Mana Puff Madness
description: Summons 4 [[Mana Puff|Mana Puffs]] at the Master Tower for each team.

name: More Dakka!
description: Ratbo Charges up for 1 sec. then shoots the nearest enemy for 40 damage per friendly Minion on the field. Reduced damage to Master Towers.

name: Morgrul the Swarmer King
description: On Spawn and on Death, Morgrul roars calling 2 [[Swarmers]] on his side. The roar also deals 50 damage and knocks nearby ground enemies back.

name: Morgrul's Ragers
description: The savagery of [[Morgrul the Swarmer King|Morgrul]]'s elites inspires others to murder a little harder.

name: Musketeer
description: An elegant fencer who periodically will duck, dip, and deflect melee attackers, then riposte for double damage.

name: Nether Bat
description: The Nether Bat is optically challenged and will ignore targets most minions would not. It's a good thing it will sometimes teleport towards a random enemy Minion.

name: Netherstep
description: Teleports friendly Minions in the area along the path to the enemy Master.

name: Nyrvir Slumbers
description: Deals damage to 2 nearby minions. Gain a '''Spectral Essence''' for each minion killed this way.

name: Nyrvir the Fallen
description: Starts the battle as [[Nyrvir Slumbers]]. Fulfill '''Accursed Ascension''' to be able to summon Nyrvir.

name: Nyrvir's Breath
description: [[Nyrvir the Fallen|Nyrvir]] swoops down and covers a large area with spiritfire, which burns all ground enemies.

name: Once Bitten
description: Give a random friendly ground Minion in the area '''Lycanthropy'''. Can only be played in your own arena.

name: Plasma Marines
description: Ranged Minions with average damage, speed and health.

name: Poison Strike
description: Showers enemy Minions in the area with the noxious fluids of Akinlep the Tainted, inflicting '''Poison'''.

name: Priestess
description: She will constantly heal a nearby damaged friendly Minion.

name: Propeller Horde
description: If a friendly Minion has '''Rage''', summon 5 more.

name: Propeller Scrats
description: Small, quick and unarmored, just like normal Scrats - except they tied propellers to their tails!

name: Prowler
description: This monster was bred to hunt. It is well known for pouncing on unsuspecting enemies dealing double damage!

name: Queen's Dragon
description: Summons [[Nyrvir the Fallen]] who breathes spiritfire on the battlefield before she lands.

name: Rabid Prowler
description: '''Sacrifice''': Gain '''Rage''' if you killed at least 1 Slitherbound.

name: Raging Reinforcements
description: Summons a [[Dragon Whelp]] or a [[Warrior]] or 4 [[Crossbow Dudes]] and gives them '''Rage!'''

name: Rammer
description: Moves fast towards buildings (he hates them), efficient at deconstruction!

name: Rampage
description: Gives friendly Minions '''Rage'''

name: Ravenous Swarmers
description: A few [[Swarmers]], but if the last card you played was a spell, they gain '''Rage''' and '''Frenzy'''.

name: Re-boomer
description: Hatches from an egg after a short delay.  As a boomer it explodes on contact or death, but turns back into an egg.

name: Red Golem
description: When played, it gains double health if it's Master is below 50% health

name: Ritual of Servitude
description: Summon a random Minion Card with Mana cost equal to the lowest cost card that started in your deck other than this card, including other versions of this card. (Max 6 Mana Minion cards can be summoned)

name: Rock Rivals
description: '''Taunt'''

name: S.T.INT
description: The Single-Track Interceptor - or S.T.INT - is fast, agile and packs quite a punch for its size.  Can't take too much punishment though.

name: Scott The Sensitive Savage
description: Though a fierce fighter, Scott is also a little emotional. He needs a cood '''Cry''' when half his health is gone. Don't worry though, he'll be ok and back in the fight soon enough!

name: Scrat Horde
description: Summons a horde of small squeaky Scrats.

name: Scrat Launcher
description: Massive range, always shoots at the nearest enemy building. Scrats go in; screaming, rocket-powered balls of fur come out.

name: Scrat Pack
description: Five weak melee minions, good for taking bridges and as cheap targets.

name: Scrat Tank
description: When not attacking, the Scrat Tank closes it's lid and becomes completely immune to damage and stuns.

name: Scratillery
description: Fires 5 furry rockets that each summon a [[Scrat Pack|Scrat]] on impact.

name: Screaming Scrat
description: This scrat is in a '''Rush''' toward the enemy Master, '''Taunting''' nearby enemies with shrill screams until it '''Explodes''' and deals damage to ALL nearby Units.

name: Sewer Scrat
description: When Sewer Scrat is hit by melee attackers, it inflicts '''Poison''' for 5 seconds.

name: Shadow Whelp
description: A sneaky dragon, using the shadows to stay invisible while not attacking or taking damage. Deals triple damage when he attacks from invisibility.

name: Shars'Rakk Twins
description: Summon an [[Incubus]], if you played a 5 mana spell just before this card, also summon a [[Succubus]]

name: Shen Stormstrike
description: Trough years of meditation, this aged Zensei has uncovered the secrets to channel lightning directly into the heard of his foes, '''stunning''' them for 2 seconds. If they are already stunned, he instead unleashes a powerful blast.

name: Shield Totem
description: Summon a Shield Totem that makes the Master's Tower immune to damage as long as its alive.

name: Shielded Crossbow Dudes
description: Still a group of weak ranged units. Still great friends. Now comes with a '''Shield'''

name: Shieldguard of Light
description: Having an '''Armor of Light''' doesn't stop this Brother from bringing a shield into battle, making him hardier than his fellow warriors. He also uses it to charge nearby enemies!

name: Shock Rock
description: Drop a stunning stone on your enemies, which '''stuns''' and damages them.

name: Skeleton Horde
description: When summoned, collect 1 '''Spectral Essence'''

name: Skeletons
description: Summon 4 skeletons

name: Slitherbound
description: Summon 1 [[Slitherbound Lancer]] and 1 [[Slitherbound Darter]].

name: Slithering Summons
description: Summon a [[Living Statue]], [[Prowler]] or [[Soul Stealer]].

name: Snake Druid
description: '''Call Slitherbound'''

name: Sniper Scrat
description: A Scrat with a sniper rifle.  Very long range and good damage, but takes a while to aim.

name: Sniper Squad
description: Sometimes less is more, but when it comes to big guns that's definitely not the case!

name: Soul Stealer
description: Sucks out the soul of anyone he kills, increasing his attack speed! (Max 300% bonus)

name: Spawn of Fury
description: '''Stun''' a random friendly minion within the area, reduce it's max health by 50%, then summon a copy of it.

name: Spear Throwers
description: A group of average melee fighters, but their first attack is a ranged spear with double damage!

name: Spirit
description: Give a random friendly Minion '''Spirit'''

name: Spirit Infusion
description: Summons 3 Spirits over 9 seconds. Each Spirit flies to a random friendly Minion and gives it '''Spirit'''

name: Spirit Vessel
description: This [[Skeletons|Skeleton]] gives a random friendly Minion '''Spirit''' on death.

name: Spiritmancer
description: '''Spectral Essence'''

name: Squire Puff
description: Once on the bridge, Squire Puff gives '''Rage''' to 5 random Friendly Minions, and then puffs out of play.

name: Stormy
description: This clumsy cloud shoots [[Chain Lightning]] at enemies, unfortunately damaging itself in the process.

name: Stun Blast
description: A large '''stun''' explosion, that leaves your enemies vulnerable.

name: Stun Lancers
description: Their attacks will '''stun''' any enemy for two whole seconds! Shocking!

name: Styxi
description: He gets depressed when missing a kill shot, making him aim carefully for 5 sec before he shoots again! Luckily he's good at hiding.

name: Succubus
description: As one of the dark sorceresses of Shars'Rakk, she is able to '''netherstep''' backwards when damaged by melee attackers.

name: Sun Burn
description: Give all Minions in a small area '''Rage''' and deal 10 damage 10 times to enemies.

name: Swarmer Totem
description: Summons groups of [[Swarmers]] over time.

name: Swarmers
description: Swarmers are fast and have decent damage but low health.

name: Tantrum Throwers
description: Summon 2 [[Spear Throwers]]. If you do not control any bridges summon 1 extra. They all gain '''Rage'''

name: Toll of the Dead
description: Summon an [[Undying Skeleton]].

name: Tombstone
description: Resurrects the next friendly minion that dies.

name: Tranquil Shi-Hou
description: An old but durable fighter that heals itself when no enemies are near. Not a big fan of monkey business

name: Trick Swap
description: Swaps the location of ALL minions on both bridges and stuns enemies for 4 sec.

name: Troubadour
description: He only ever learned one song, but to compensate he plays it constantly. This '''Taunts''' all nearby enemies, making them want to end the miserable auditory assault!

name: Undying Skeleton
description: '''Spectral Essence'''

name: Wall
description: Plenty of health, no attack. A perfect distraction for building haters

name: Warrior
description: High health and fairly good melee damage.

name: Wheel Of Doom
description: Hits every ground target in a line 2 times for 150 damage. If something survives both hits, the Wheel breaks.

name: Whirly Scrat
description: A melee area damage dealer with decent health - has a hard time socializing.

name: Wizard Puff
description: If it dies, '''Destroy''' a random enemy Minion or Building and turn it into a friendly [[Mana Puff]]!

name: Wolf Among Sheep
description: Summon 4 [[Legionnaires]]. One of them gains '''Lycanthropy''' at random.

name: Wreckinator 9000
description: This metal monster will first '''slice and dice''', then '''slam and bam'''. At least until it '''Self-Destruct'''s.

name: Xiao Long
description: Every time an opponent casts a spell, Xiao Long gains '''Rage''','''Frenzy''' and '''Shield'''

name: Zap Shrine
description: A thousand lightning strikes have imbued this stone with the ability to '''stun'''  the closest enemy for 2 seconds.

name: Zeppelin Bomber
description: Flying over the battlefield it drops bombs on unsuspecting buildings!
